attributes.action: Make the priority for COVID vaccination NHS, Teachers and Carers
attributes.additional_details: Healthcare, education and social care workers and systems are most under pressure to turn up each day help others. Their exposure and risk of catching, and spreading, covid is high and the impact of not being able to provide health care, education and social care will undermine our recovery in the short term and society in the long term
attributes.background: If we are to protect the most vulnerable and recover quickly, both socially and economically, these groups will need protecting first and foremost.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Make frontline NHS health workers top priority for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562854

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316

Staff working in care homes for older adults are already in the top priority group for vaccination, and frontline health and social care workers are in the second priority group: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/covid-19-vaccination-care-home-and-healthcare-settings-posters/covid-19-vaccination-first-phase-priority-groups
